CustomField.formula: Account.Name & BR() & Account.BillingStreet &BR()& Account.BillingCity &', '& Account.BillingState &' '& Account.BillingPostalCode &BR() & Account.BillingCountry&br()& Account.Phone
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is the linked Address. If you need to update the billing address, you can do on the contact page, through the non linked Account Billing Address Field
CustomField.label: Account Billing Address (Linked)
